text: Naa pɛ ka ɠɛ, naa ɠa a kɛ gului nɔpɛ é ɓɛtɛzu ziɛlaʋɛ, é mina waso ná-gaaɠoozai maaʋele ma, é mina nɔungi wuzeɠe é ʋa zei tonaɓiingi ʋa, nii a kɛ gulu wola nɔpɛ ziɛi zɛɓɛzu gaa mina ɠooza ná-wasogi zu. Tɔɔzei gulu wolaiti ta nuɓusɛiti, saai leʋeʋɛ ti pɛ ma, ga ti yei gɔvɛalaazu zooi wu, naati pɔ bɛ ti yeizu kabai zu.
